description: Christina Carter is back, and proves once and for all she is not just a glamour bondage model. Very few people can pull off glam bondage and Hogtied. fewer yet can pull off a real time Hogtied shoot. Over one hour of non-stop action-- no breaks, no cuts, real time BDSM action. You see it all--the tying, the untying, the determination, and the joy of accomplishment. You get a category 5 suspension and multiple orgasms. You get liberal use of the cane. All and all a nice day's work! Exhausting but rewarding. Christina was very proud to go the entire 71 minutes, so let her know you appreciated it.
title: Christina Carter
